categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male Human Jedi Knight lived at some point during the galactic history. He wore a robe traditional for the Jedi apparel and wielded a blue-bladed lightsaber.

This character was depicted on the "Jedi Knight" card of the Champions of the Force, the base set of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game, which was illustrated by artist Roger Chamberlain. Most cards of the game depict the events of the Galactic Civil War, though exceptions such as the Wall of light were rare, but still possible. Therefore, it is impossible to determine the time period this Jedi lived in without additional information.
